required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Adherence and the Patient Acceptability of Zomacton® Treatment With the Zomajet® Vision X Device

oversight_info.authority: France: The Commission nationale de l’informatique et des libertés
France: Comité consultatif sur le traitement de l'information en matière de recherche dans le domaine de la santé

brief_summary.textblock: The study is performed to collect long-term data on the treatment adherence and patient's acceptability when Zomacton®10 mg is administered with the Zomajet® Vision X device in patients with a growth hormone deficiency or Turner's syndrome.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.description: Ratio between actual duration of administration and total duration recommended by physician

arm_group.arm_group_label: Zomacton® treatment with Zomajet® Vision X device

intervention.arm_group_label: Zomacton® treatment with Zomajet® Vision X device

study_pop.textblock: Patients with a growth hormone deficiency or Turner's syndrome.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient with growth hormone deficiency,
1. Diagnosis of growth hormone deficiency proven by appropriate exploration
2. Size ≤ -2 Standard Deviation (SD) according to the French references
3. Growth velocity in the previous year inferior to the normal for age (-1SD) or < 4cm/year
- Growth deficiency due to Turner's syndrome
1. Turner's syndrome confirmed by a karyotype
2. Patient's size ≤ -2 SD according to the French references
3. Bone age < 12 years
- Patient who require a minimum of 18 months of treatment.
Exclusion Criteria:
- There are no exclusion criteria except the contraindication for Zomacton® 10 mg

overall_contact_backup.last_name: There may be other sites in this country

facility.name: Hôpital des Enfants, CHU de Toulouse
